name: Pinnacle Aviation Academy
about: Pinnacle Aviation Academy, located in Carlsbad, California, has been a premier flight training institution since 1997. Founded by George and Sheri McJimsey, the academy has a legacy of excellence, now continued by new owners Rob and Lauryn Anderson as of 2024. We offer Part 141 and Part 61 training programs for Private, Instrument, Commercial, and Multi-Engine pilots, as well as Flight Instructor and CFII/MEI certifications. Our fleet includes new Cessna aircraft with G1000 and Garmin avionics. With a commitment to safety, quality instruction, and competitive pricing, Pinnacle Aviation Academy is dedicated to helping students achieve their aviation goals, whether for recreational, business, or professional purposes. Join us to turn your aviation dreams into reality.
